title: Evaluation of Pre-Mathematics Course Effectiveness: Strengthening Foundational Competencies through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary-Level Basic Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: Course for in-service practitioners to improve foundational mathematics competencies, involving LMS learning via smartphones followed by optional face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate over 20% improvement in basic mathematical problem-solving skills compared to pre-course diagnostic assessment scores
Learners complete and submit over 80% of online tests provided through the LMS
Learners who participate in optional in-person classes improve learning strategy utilization by 15% in pre-post comparisons

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
